name: B. Bear and Three Musketeers
statement:
Do you know a story about the three musketeers? Anyway, you will learn
about its origins now.Richelimakieu is a cardinal in the city of Bearis.
He is tired of dealing with crime by himself. He needs three brave
warriors to help him to fight against bad guys.There are warriors.
Richelimakieu wants to choose three of them to become musketeers but
it’s not that easy. The most important condition is that musketeers must
know each other to cooperate efficiently. And they shouldn’t be too well
known because they could be betrayed by old friends. For each musketeer
his is the number of warriors he knows, excluding other two
musketeers.Help Richelimakieu! Find if it is possible to choose three
musketeers knowing each other, and what is minimum possible sum of their
recognitions.
